set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} -Ulinux")
add_subdirectory(process-cpp-minimal)
add_subdirectory(android-emugl)
add_subdirectory(xdg)
add_subdirectory(backward-cpp)
add_subdirectory(cpu_features)
SET(BUILD_CODE_GEN ON)
set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} -Wno-error=old-style-cast -Wno-error=unused-variable")
add_subdirectory(sdbus-cpp)
